technologies.description: React: Used to build the frontend of the website
Docker: Used to containerize the website
Google Cloud Platforms: Used to deploy the website and to integrate a CI/CD pipeline
Git: Used to manage versioning and to integrate the CI/CD pipeline
Node.js: Used as the runtime environment
TypeScript: Used to write type-safe JavaScript for better code quality
Nginx: Used to serve the application and handle reverse proxying
npm: Used for managing packages and dependencies
